job.title: Web Developer and Software Engineer - ASP.NET C#
job.description: <p>Are you interested in helping to transform the way people communicate?</p><p><br></p><p>Multimedia Solutions is a cutting-edge digital consulting firm focused on revolutionizing the way our Fortune 2000 clients reach their clients. As a Website Developer and Software Engineer, your responsibilities will include designing, developing, and maintaining software application components using C# (programming language), ASP.NET, AJAX, Model-View Controller (MVC), JQuery, Web Services, XML, XSD, XSLT, etc.</p><p><br></p><p>If you embrace a close-knit small business environment and want to have a big impact on the firm, our clients, and your career, please read on.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>&nbsp;Software Developer Benefits</strong></p><ul><li>Opportunity to work on web development projects for Fortune 2000 companies</li><li>Opportunity to work on the Multimedia Solutions Digital Experience platform vision</li><li>Work with the latest programming technologies on websites, mobile computing, content management, and social media</li><li>Competitive salary with benefits, bonus opportunities, and training.&nbsp;Plus, you get to work with really smart people</li><li>A culture founded on the principles of excellence, respect, accountability, integrity, enjoyment, and diversity</li><li>The exciting and ideal work environment of feeling part of a start-up but yet in a company with a solid 28-year reputation</li><li>Health and Dental Benefits</li><li>H1 Sponsorship</li><li>401K Plan</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements</strong></p><ul><li>C#</li><li>.NET</li><li>ASP.NET</li><li>ASP.NET MVC</li><li>Razor</li><li>Umbraco CMS or&nbsp;other .NET based CMS exposure&nbsp;</li><li>JavaScript / AJAX</li></ul>
